name: Pennington Creative
tagline: Perfect Your Brand. Partner with Pennington.
description:
Originally founded in 2008 as a marketplace for student workers, Student Experts re-focused as a content marketing agency in 2011. Since then, under the new name Pennington Creative, our brand has been dedicated to providing dynamic original online content to its clients.
Pennington Creative offers a wide range of white-label content creation services, including blog posts, social media posts, infographics, SEO web copy, press releases, custom writing and design projects, and much more.
READ MORE...
